name: BBF Technologies
tag_list: manufacturing, plastics, semiconductor, equipment, portland, oregon
overview: BBF Technologies is a leading semiconductor equipment and industrial process equipment manufacturer. We specialize in wet benches, fume hoods, chemical delivery, tanks and carts. Serving the electronic, semiconductor, medical, research, pharmaceutical, biotech and metal plating industries, we provide specialty design solutions coupled with on-time delivery. We maintain stringent quality standards for all our products. Our mission is to provide products that are designed and manufactured to exceed our customersâ€™ expectations.
